description:
From chilly not quite summer mornings, to brisk fall days, the Provincial long sleeved jersey is a worthy addition to your kit. The versatility of a long sleeve jersey is what keeps them near the front of the gear closet, year-round. Made from a light recycled poly blend, this jersey helps keep you cool and protects you from the sun.

  • Recycled polyester blend has wicking and antimicrobial finishes
  • Full length front zip for easy heat control
  • 3 back pockets mean there is plenty of room for gels, a bottle, pump, arm warmers, whatever you like to bring long for the ride
  • Dropped hem with gripper elastic offers plenty of coverage when you’re in the drop
  • Gusseted sleeves keep the sleeves from riding up when you are out on the hoods
  • Reflective details help you standout
  • UPF 30 blocks more than 95% of harsh UV
  • Trim athletic fit won’t get in your way and leaves room to layer
name: MEC Provincial Long Sleeve Jersey - Men's
